titleStmt.title: The copie of an epistle sent by Iohn Knox one of the ministers of the Englishe Church at Geneua vnto the inhabitants of Newcastle, & Barwike. In the end wherof is added a briefe exhortation to England for the spedie imbrasing of Christes gospel hertofore suppressed & banished.
titleStmt.author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.

titleStmt.title: The copie of an epistle sent by Iohn Knox one of the ministers of the Englishe Church at Geneua vnto the inhabitants of Newcastle, & Barwike. In the end wherof is added a briefe exhortation to England for the spedie imbrasing of Christes gospel hertofore suppressed & banished.
titleStmt.author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 15065 on UMI microfilm reel 473.
Considerable print show-through; some leaves cropped at head.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at UMI microfilm reels 442 and 473 (Bodleian Library copy).
